description: Madfællesskabet focuses on enhancing the food industry through collaboration among various stakeholders, including producers, chefs, and political entities. It aims to drive political conversations about local food sourcing, facilitate networking events, and promote knowledge sharing through workshops and festivals. By creating platforms for dialogue and collaboration, the initiative seeks to improve food culture and practices, ensuring that local products are prioritized in public kitchens. The overarching goal is to foster a sustainable food ecosystem that benefits both consumers and producers alike.
name: Madfællesskabet
